line.style: fill: none; stroke: #ed1c24; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-miterlimit: 10; stroke-width: 4px;
fill: none; stroke: #ed1c24; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-miterlimit: 10; stroke-width: 4px;

circle.style: fill: none; stroke: #231f20; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-miterlimit: 10; stroke-width: 4px;
